title: Palentonga (monster)
data:
{{Obsolete}}
''This page is about the monster. For the player [[species]], see [[Palentonga]].''
{{monster info|palentonga}}

'''Palentongas''' are six-limbed scaled mammalians. If you see one, it's either part of a vault or a [[shapeshifter (monster)|shapeshifter]].

==Tips & Tricks==
None needed.

==History==
*Palentonga monsters were removed along with the player species in [[0.30]].
*Palentonga monsters were added along with the player species in [[0.26]], but were largely dummied out until [[0.29]].
